name: NSAffineTransformStruct
desc: A structure that defines the three-by-three matrix that performs an affine transform between two coordinate systems.

items.name: init(m11: CGFloat, m12: CGFloat, m21: CGFloat, m22: CGFloat, tX: CGFloat, tY: CGFloat)
items.desc: Initializes a transformation matrix with the given values.

items.name: var m11: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes scaling, rotation, and shear.

items.name: var m12: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes scaling, rotation, and shear.

items.name: var m21: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes scaling, rotation, and shear.

items.name: var m22: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes scaling, rotation, and shear.

items.name: var tX: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes translation.

items.name: var tY: CGFloat
items.desc: An element of the transform matrix that contributes translation.
